name: Owl Together
description:
It's all about owls in this multiplayer strategy game that explores the topic of climate change!

Spotted owls and barred owls are related species who used to occupy separate territories across the western United States. Recently, increases in temperature have forced the barred owls to move into the spotted owls' territory, endangering the continued survival of both species! This game explores this situation by putting players in control of each owl species.

Created by Rose Abernathy, Fred Tarabout, Paula Escuadra, and Dren Mcdonald for the 2015 Climate Game Jam.
